name: Turning Memories into New Traditions - My First Kiln
blurb: I make terracotta tableware that reflects childhood memories, homes & traditions around the table. It is time to buy my first kiln.

name: Make 100: Handmade illustrated ceramic plates
blurb: I will be handcrafting and hand painting 100 plates, each piece tells a story of its own.

name: El chesco!
blurb: Recipiente de cerámica, inspirado en tradiciones sociales del México moderno / Ceramic vessel, inspired by traditions of modern Mexico

name: Make 100 x Bowls by GEMS: A Ceramic Collaboration
blurb: Two potters, Gabby and Ericka, fuse styles to make 100 new unique & colorful ceramic bowls!

name: Make 100 - Miniature Animal Ceramic Bowls and Salad Plates
blurb: Support two potters as they develop their skills and try to make a business out of their pottery.
